Human.description: Versatile and adaptive, Humans populate the galaxy thoroughly. A true testament to imperialism.

Undying.description: Reanimated by blight, the Undying are corpses of those who once were, with a semblance of humanity still retained.

Other.description: The Others are a mysterious and mischievous race that blend in with nature. They excel at illusion and manipulation.

Automaton.description: Forged from metal and magic, automatons are durable and emotionless.

Seraphim.description: Winged beings of radiant power, often aligned with holy light.

Voidborn.description: Spawned in the depths of space, voidborn are immune to madness and corruption.

Spiritkin.description: Spiritual hybrids that heal outside combat and walk between planes.

Pyrrhan.description: Born of flame, Pyrrhans burn bright and burn fast, excelling in fire damage.

Reaper.description: Harbinger of the dead, the Reaper collects souls and uses them and blood magic to decimate foes.
bonuses: Collects the souls of the Damned.

Mystic.description: Nature-bound healers who regenerate health and poison enemies with natural magic.

Pyromancer.description: Fire casters who use fire to burn stuff. Hot.

Chronomancer.description: Wielders of time, Chronomancers slow, stun, and manipulate cooldowns to cripple foes.
bonuses: Age their bodies with temporal magic

Voidcaller.description: Summoners who call upon void-touched entities to fight in their place.

Foresworn.description: Dark warriors bound to cursed weapons, excelling at brutal melee and anti-magic.

Ironveil.description: Stalwart defenders that use shields and counterattacks, thriving under pressure.

Dreadthorn.description: A rotting forest world teeming with corruption, zealotry, and the undead.

Cinderrift.description: A world without rotation, half in eternal darkness and the other eternal light.

Ferrania.description: A dense jungle planet where all life holds a grudge.

Fractalis.description: A fractured, crystalline planet where time slips and magic pulses.

Hollowreach.description: A void-ridden world filled with echoing silence and elite horrors.

Halcyon Bastion.description: A once-holy fortress in the sky now fractured by radiant madness.

Gravemount.description: A battlefield planet covered in metal, traps, and relentless armies.

Dread Swamp.description: Weak regenerators and blood-fed fauna wander these twisted woods.

Marrow Rise.description: Dread Swamp Zone 2 〔 Carnivorous plants and parasitic creatures thrive in sickly wetlands.

Cryptroot Vale.description: Undead swarm beneath cursed soil with lifedrain attacks.

Gravepetal Thicket.description: Cryptroot Vale Zone 2 〔 Withered flora and crawling corpses poison the air with every breath.

Chapel of Withering Faith.description: Zealots channel holy light into deadly healing magic.

Reliquary of Blessed Decay.description: Chapel of Withering Faith Zone 2 〔 Purifiers wield light to cauterize sin and decay alike.

Scorched Hollow.description: Blighted beasts burn with fire and toxic trails.

Molten Thorns.description: Scorched Hollow Zone 2 〔 Thorned serpents spew magma and corruption across the charred ground.

Infernis Roost.description: Scorched Hollow Zone 3 〔 Home to the dragon lord and his army of younglings.

Crossover.description: The land between, a dense jungle of ruins.

Thicket Sprawl.description: Crossover Zone 2 〔 The jungles grow denser.

Verdant Grove.description: Crossover Zone 3 〔 The home of the Grove Queen and her inner circle.

The White Expanse.description: Dense blizzards and frozen lakes attract the most extreme creatures.

Frostbound Cavern.description: The White Expanse Zone 2 〔 You find rest among a deep cave system, home of the Yetins.

The Deepest Depths.description: The White Expanse Zone 3 〔 You have found the end of the cavern. A massive and endless pit lies before you.

Clockwork Caverns.description: Enemies with extreme haste and unstable time effects.

Torsion Halls.description: Clockwork Caverns Zone 2 〔 Bent space and warped machinery accelerate battle to a blur.

Refraction Fields.description: Illusions and time-reversals challenge your reflexes.

Lightfract Nexus.description: Refraction Fields Zone 2 〔 Beings of fractured thought and mirrored magic strike from every angle.

Temporal Apex.description: Time collapses around you as cooldowns shift and enemies evolve.

Epoch Spiral.description: Temporal Apex Zone 2 〔 Reality splinters as evolving forms and broken time converge.

Desolation Tunnels.description: Slow, elite monsters with massive health pools.

Ironwake Depths.description: Desolation Tunnels Zone 2 〔 Forgotten giants stir with seismic force and unholy resilience.

Whispershade Vale.description: Debuff-heavy horrors twist your mind and suppress your powers.

Nightveil Hollow.description: Whispershade Vale Zone 2 〔 Disembodied whispers shred your focus and unravel sanity.

Astral Maw.description: A void vortex full of weird impossible creatures.

Singularity Core.description: Astral Maw Zone 2 〔 A collapsing domain where reality frays and only nightmares remain.

Sanctum Gate.description: Radiant archers and judged warriors strike with holy fury.

Sentinel Rise.description: Sanctum Gate Zone 2 〔 Watchers wield divine arrows that pierce even the incorporeal.

Blade of Grace.description: Counter-focused duels that punish AoE or weak defenses.

Chamber of Judged Steel.description: Blade of Grace Zone 2 〔 Duelists punish excess and strike in precise, divine retaliation.

Cathedral of Fidelity.description: Spellcasters purge corruption and punish sins in radiant fire.

Celestial Inquisition.description: Cathedral of Fidelity Zone 2 〔 Blazing heralds incinerate soul and flesh with purging fire.

Warfront Trenches.description: Endless war churns these muddy trenches where discipline and fortified strength are the only path to survival.

Siegewake Plateau.description: Warfront Trenches Zone 2 〔 Artillery beasts and shield-breakers test your durability with crushing might.

Craterforge Expanse.description: Metal-clad berserkers and heat-hardened horrors brawl in scorched killing fields.

Forgecore.description: Craterforge Expanse Zone 2 〔 Frenzied juggernauts unleash devastating attacks amid smoldering slagstorms.

Shieldspire Bastion.description: Unbreakable constructs and formation fighters demand flawless defense to outlast the onslaught.

Ironhold Apex.description: Shieldspire Bastion Zone 2 〔 Adaptive sentinels scale in power unless broken through by unmatched defense.
